de.th.wildau.dsc.sne.webserver
Class HttpHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.th.wildau.dsc.sne.webserver.HttpHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class HttpHandler
extends Object
implements Runnable

A handler which is invoked to process HTTP exchanges. Each HTTP exchange is handled by one of these handlers. Handle the given request and generate an appropriate response.

Author:
sne
